data.title: ODA-Nettverk on LinkedIn: #leadthechange
data.meta_description: Thank you to all who attended our CEO Executive Roundtable this morning – hosted by ODA Network together with Cisco and Microsoft! The theme was AI for… | 10 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
🎉 These are the winners of the ODA Awards 2024! 🏆 The long-awaited ODA Inspirational Day is finally here, and we're thrilled to introduce this year's winners of the ODA Awards! Congratulations to all of them: 🌟 ODA Changemaker: Monika Swiderska in Equinor 💻 ODA Techie: Ingrid Kindem in Naer® 👑 ODA Leader: Hans-Henrik Merckoll in IBM 🏅 ODA Champions: Evidi Read more about the winners on our website 👇 and join us in celebrating them in the comments! https://lnkd.in/dvUwXSBP Let's continue to #Leadthechange together on this inspiring ODA Inspirational Day!

🌟 THANK YOU 🌟 It’s been a little over two weeks since ODA Inspiration Day, and we’re still buzzing with excitement! We want to send a HUGE thank you to all participants, speakers, partners, and volunteers who made ODA Inspiration Day 2024 such a success! We couldn't have done it without you! Endless thanks and a round of applause to our amazing ODA Inspiration Day team: Guro Sandersen, Kristine Kjenes, Nina Stolpestad, Trude Ruud Nyhus, Charlotte Söderström, Anne Melsom Bjerke, Darina Nygard, Annette Karlstad 🌻🍉, Anette Kilebu, Tora Cecilia Lie, Thea Alice Wøien, Silja Haddal Mork, Andreas Ljones, Kine Dahl. And big thanks to Flow Event for capturing the highlights on video! 🎥 #ODAInspirationDay #ODANettverk #LeadTheChange

🌟 Let's connect TODAY at our final event before the summer break! 🎉 ☀️Prindsen hage 🗓️ June 19th from 17:30 - 20:00. ODA Network invites you to our summer edition afterwork. Whether you're a seasoned expert or just starting your journey, come and network, find inspiration, and explore potential collaborations. Tables are booked from 17:30 to 20:00, with ODA volunteers available throughout. Feel free to bring a friend! 👋 Register here (you have to be logged in at odanettverk.no) 👇 https://lnkd.in/d_b4VCnE We can't wait to see you there and look forward to more events starting in August! #odanettverk #leadthechange #networkevent #afterwork

ODA Inspiration Day 2024 - What a Day! 🎉 Last week, ODA Inspiration Day took place, and what an incredible day it was! A huge thank you to all participants, speakers, hosts, and everyone involved for making it such a fantastic event 🙏 With the theme "Decoding Decisions," ODA Inspiration Day offered insightful discussions on decision-making in technology, leadership, and personal development. The day was hosted by actress and Mensa Award winner Selda Ekiz. Attendees gained valuable insights into AI and data analysis, strategies for better leadership decisions, and techniques to overcome cognitive biases and manage uncertainty. The event featured panel discussions, interactive workshops, and networking opportunities, providing participants with practical tools and inspiration to enhance their decision-making processes. 🌟 Also, Congratulations to all the winners of the ODA Awards 2024. 🏆 We’re already looking forward to next year! 🚀 Here are a few highlights from the day! 📸 Erik N.H Krafft, Krafftwork #ODANettverk #ODAInspirationday #leadthechangenge

🎉 CEO Roundtable 2024 was a success! 🎉 Today, we gathered at the Oslo Concert Hall for our CEO Roundtable event before the ODA Inspiration Day kicked off, and it was nothing short of inspiring. We discussed navigating the future amidst technological advancements and challenges. A huge thank you to our speakers, Birgitte Bryne and Mie Caroline Holstad from Norges Bank Investment Management, Rikke Kragelund from Implement Consulting Group – and to all CEO’s and other C Suites attending, for engaging in discussion and knowledge sharing on such an important topic: Shaping Tomorrow. As leaders, you have the power to drive change, advocate for policies that foster equality, champion sustainable practices and support innovations that benefit society. May you continue leading the change and serving as a true role models, promoting diversity and inclusion within your network and beyond. 💡 Key takeaways from this year’s CEO Roundtable: 1. Psychological Safety is crucial for innovation and resilience. 2. Empathetic Leadership enhances decision-making and team dynamics. 3. Both/And Thinking is important to find solutions that combine multiple benefits, like improving quality while reducing costs. Also, thanks to the eminent team from ODA Network that have made this event happen: Kine Dahl, Kainaat Qaiser Mir, Kristine Hofer Næss, Silje Finnskog Jensen, Gunn Severinsen, Nina Grøsvik Ådnanes, Jane Xia, Stine Selvikvåg, Eline Lindsten og Maiken Danielsen Mandal, and Dag Fredrik Bjørnland from Implement Consulting Group 💫 📷 all photos: NewsLab AS
